item.title: Rubbish in a struggling green space, 10th December
item.description:

item.title: Romanian number plate dumped there for 10 days nows. Not moved., 10th December
item.description:
It has been dumped there and has not moved for 10 days now. Been vandalised and broken in to with the door hanging off of the back....

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Benares Road, Plumstead

item.title: Bonfires, 10th December
item.description:
Please can this be passed onto the relevant team as there is nowhere else to report the daily bonfires in the garden of number 49,first avenue.i believe this is supposed to be an area where burning rubbish is illegal.it is atleast three times a week and appears to be general rubbish with thick,black,pungent smoke.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): First Avenue, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
